sentences.english: Xue in order to protect the security of LaoZheng, holding the LaoZheng, he had been wounded.
sentences.chinese: 雪兒爲了保護老鄭的安全，抱着老鄭，自己被打傷了。

sentences.english: “Chinese people don’t dislike chocolate,” says Ms. Zheng.
sentences.chinese: “中國人不喜歡巧克力”，鄭女士表示。

sentences.english: A practitioner surnamed Zheng, from a county of Heilongjiang, still practices Falun Gong secretly.
sentences.chinese: 一名來自黑龍江某縣姓鄭的練習者仍然在祕密練功。

sentences.english: Cheng give it to G, G put it in the briefcase.
sentences.chinese: 鄭小心翼翼地遞給朱，朱把它裝進公文包。

sentences.english: Ian Teh has donated this photograph taken in Inner Mongolia from the series Traces.
sentences.chinese: 鄭永仁從內蒙古痕跡系列捐贈一張照片作是次拍賣。

sentences.english: The boy has suffered complications following the surgery.
sentences.chinese: 手術之後，小鄭的身體出現一系列的併發症。

sentences.english: Mr. Zheng Guoguang, Director of China Meteorological Administration, attended the meeting and delivered a special report.
sentences.chinese: 中國氣象局局長鄭國光到會作專題報告。

sentences.english: Placard of the Zhengyuan below the arrangement that becomes in Lu Huai took an examination of graduate student of naval ships college.
sentences.chinese: 在魯淮成的安排下鄭遠海報考了艦艇學院研究生。

sentences.english: With that, Zheng walked into the kitchen and cooked that turtle.
sentences.chinese: 說完，鄭就走到廚房裏煮那隻龜。

sentences.english: A man of the state of Zheng bought the casket but gave back the pearls.
sentences.chinese: 鄭國人只買了他的匣子，而退還了他的珍珠。

sentences.english: Minister Lin so LaoZheng derivation handsome in gone with the wind.
sentences.chinese: 林部長於是就要用老鄭引出帥飄。

sentences.english: Zheng Yuqing was so honest and wise that people always praised him.
sentences.chinese: 鄭餘慶是那麼的正直英明，人們都稱讚他。

sentences.english: Zheng Wenguang is widely the father of Chinese science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 鄭文廣是中國公認的科幻小說之父。

sentences.english: Vincent is now an MPhil student in HKUST's Biology Department.
sentences.chinese: 鄭元山現在是香港科技大學生物系的哲學碩士研究生。

sentences.english: She was transferred to the library later.
sentences.chinese: 鄭老師對我極好，後來調去圖書館工作。

sentences.english: Lao Zheng was not pleased with Xiao Zheng, who always idled about the town.
sentences.chinese: 小鄭總是在鎮裏閒逛，老鄭對他有些不滿。

definition: surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
